mapper.select: SELECT od.ORDER_ID orderId, od.EXORDER_ID exorderId, od.TOTAL_PRICE totalPrice, oa.ORDER_TYPE orderType, od.CREATE_DATE createDate, od.STAT stat, os.DEPDAY depDate, os.ARVDAY arrDate FROM t_odm_order od LEFT JOIN T_OMD_ORDER_ATTR oa ON od.ORDER_ID = oa.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN T_ODM_PASGINFO pasg ON oa.Id = pasg.ORDER_ATTR_ID LEFT JOIN T_ODM_PAYINFO opay ON od.ORDER_ID = opay.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN T_ODM_PASGSECT os ON pasg.Id = os.PASG_INFO_ID LEFT JOIN T_ODM_FLTINFO of ON os.T_O_ID = of.id WHERE od.MEMBER_ID = #{member} AND od.ORDER_SRC='MZ013' GROUP BY od.ORDER_ID ORDER BY od.EXORDER_ID DESC limit 0,10

SELECT os.DEPDAY depday,of.* FROM t_odm_order od LEFT JOIN T_OMD_ORDER_ATTR oa ON od.ORDER_ID = oa.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN T_ODM_PASGINFO pasg ON oa.Id = pasg.ORDER_ATTR_ID LEFT JOIN T_ODM_PAYINFO opay ON od.ORDER_ID = opay.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN T_ODM_PASGSECT os ON pasg.Id = os.PASG_INFO_ID LEFT JOIN T_ODM_FLTINFO of ON os.T_O_ID = of.id WHERE od.ORDER_ID=#{id} AND od.ORDER_SRC='MZ013' ORDER BY os.DEPDAY ASC,od.EXORDER_ID DESC
